backend/main.mo: Main actor for the Blue Panthers sign-up app; handles user profiles, position-based sign-up submission with capacity validation (guard: 1, forward/center: 2), and admin queries with access control.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that overrides the stored positionConfig to enforce correct max capacities (forward: 2, center: 2, guard: 1) on upgrade.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the HeroSection stats bar guard-capacity update (1 slot, singular) to its implementation file and test requirement REQ-2.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend source files for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind directives and OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with the page title 'Blue Panthers â€“ NCAA Sign-Up' and a meta description for the basketball team registration app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with two routes: '/' for SignUpPage inside Layout, and '/owner' for OwnerDashboard.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero banner component with a stats bar that displays position availability, showing '1 Slot Open' (singular) for Guard using GUARD_MAX_CAPACITY and '2 Slots Open' for Forward and Center.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Full-page layout wrapper with a sticky navy header displaying the Blue Panthers logo and 'League. maine' subtitle, plus a branded footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using TanStack Query, reinitializing when the Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state and persisting identity via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for submitting player sign-ups and fetching all sign-ups from the backend canister actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Barlow fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines a navy/gold dark theme via CSS custom properties.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/OwnerDashboard.tsx: Owner-only dashboard page that displays all player sign-ups in a styled table with position and experience labels, including login/logout controls.
frontend/src/pages/SignUpPage.tsx: Public sign-up page with a form for players to register their name, contact info, position, and experience level, with capacity-aware validation and success feedback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the theme with custom fonts (Barlow/Barlow Condensed), oklch-based color palettes (navy, gold, semantic tokens), dark mode support, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the current project state (version 3) for a basketball sign-up app, recording existing features and pending action requests related to changing the Guard position's max capacity from 2 to 1 in both frontend and backend.
